name: PoPo's Planet
description:
When the sun is out, the PoPos frolic about! But once night falls, the PoPos engage in incredible violence. 

Knock players off the ever-shrinking PoPo planet, and be the last one standing!

Controls

  • Escape: Show/Hide Mouse
  • Tab: Toggle Server Info
  • WASD/Arrow keys: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • P: Pause
  • Enter: Start Game
  • Left Click: Attack
  • Middle Mouse: Switch Weapons
  • Mouse: Camera

Credits:
